ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'O Lord, expand my breast for me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said: "O my Lord, enlarge my breast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "Lord! Open my breast for me;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “My Lord, open up my breast for me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "O my Lord! Open for me my chest."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my Lord! Expand my breast for me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lord, open my breast,' said Moses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Moses) said: My Lord! relieve my mind
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "My Lord! open up my heart,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! expand for me my breast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Open my breast for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Moses) said: "O my Lord! expand me my breast;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Musa (Moses)] said: "O my Lord! Open for me my chest (grant me self-confidence, contentment, and boldness).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, put my heart at peace for me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:25] He said, ‘My Lord, expand my breast for me, expand it so that it may accommodate the [weight of the Divine] Message.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Moses) said: My Lord! Relieve my mind) soften my heart so that I do not fear him,
